page.title: 11State Schools
page.content: Each school day about 80% of local children come to schools in our area. The LEA provides buses for pupils who live more than 2 miles from school. Others arrive on foot, by bike or by car. {First schools,}for pupils aged 5-9 are Manor Park (CE) and St Mary's (RC).{Middle schools}(9-13) are Dorchester Middle and St Osmunds (CE). All these schools are mixed, but the comphensive{Upper schools}(13-18) are Castlefield for girls and Hardye's for boys. There are also 2{Special schools -Maiden Castle which takes physically handicapped children aged 2-11, and Penwithen which has maladjusted pupils aged 7-16. Both upper schools have good sports facilities including gymnasia, swimming pools, tennis courts, sports pitches, and fields and tracks for athletics.
